description.zh: Activepieces 是一个开源的自动化平台，通过使用 TypeScript 编写的类型安全的 pieces 框架进行扩展。它支持与超过 200 个服务集成，并提供 AI 优先的工作流、企业级部署以及社区驱动的开发模式。该平台为技术用户和非技术用户都提供了无代码构建工具。
description.en: Activepieces is an open-source automation platform designed to be extensible through a type-safe pieces framework written in TypeScript. It enables users to create and manage integrations with over 200 services and supports AI-first workflows, enterprise-ready deployment, and community-driven development. The platform offers a no-code builder for both technical and non-technical users.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 为技术用户和非技术用户提供直观的界面。
- 拥有开放的生态系统，60% 的集成模块由社区贡献。
- 提供最大的开源 MCP 工具包，所有模块均可作为 MCP 服务器使用。
- 使用 TypeScript 构建，支持完全定制和开发者友好体验。
- 原生支持 AI 工作流，包含 AI SDK 和 AI 模块。
- 支持企业级部署，可自定义品牌和控制。
- 强调安全性设计，支持自托管和网络隔离。
- 支持人工介入流程，用于审批或延迟执行。

## 功能列表:

- 可视化工作流构建器，支持拖放操作。
- 支持循环、分支和自动重试。
- 支持 HTTP 和 NPM 代码集成。
- AI 辅助代码模块中的数据清理功能。
- 完全版本控制的自动化流程。
- 多语言支持和可定制模板。
- 超过 200 个预置集成模块。
- 支持本地模块开发的热重载。
- 内置人工输入接口（聊天、表单）。
- 社区驱动的开发与贡献。
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Offers an intuitive interface for both technical and non-technical users.
- Features an open ecosystem with 60% of integration pieces contributed by the community.
- Provides the largest open-source MCP toolkit, with all pieces available as MCP servers.
- Built with TypeScript for full customization and developer-friendly experience.
- Designed for AI-first workflows with native AI pieces and AI SDK.
- Enterprise-ready with branding control and secure, self-hosted deployment.
- Emphasizes security by design with network-gapped and data-controlled environments.
- Supports human-in-the-loop automation for approval or delay execution.

## Features:

- Visual workflow builder with drag-and-drop interface.
- Support for loops, branches, and auto-retries.
- HTTP and NPM code integration.
- AI-assisted data cleaning in code pieces.
- Fully versioned automation flows.
- Multilingual support and customizable templates.
- Over 200+ pre-built integration pieces.
- Hot-reloading for local piece development.
- Built-in interfaces for human input (chat, form).
- Community-driven development and contributions.
